globaluserpage-notice:
Message shown above user pages from ShoutWiki Hub. Parameters:
* $1 - the revision ID of the page that was fetched
globaluserpage-edit-tab: Text on tab that replaces "create", and links to the edit interface on ShoutWiki Hub
globaluserpage-footer: Footer shown on global user pages. $1 is the user's name, and $2 is a link to the original user page on the central wiki.
